Author: 3cats_in_atrenchcoat
Text: I’m not anti drug at all. But snorting caffeine really isn’t going to get you the kind of high you are looking for. It’s just not a great drug to snort. And it’s going to tear your nose the fuck up. Adding to this the toxicity of caffeine sits around 400 mg and pills tend to gave dosages between 50-200 per.    However it’s probably not the most horrible thing you could do to yourself.   Check out reports from this site https://erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=94854 this is just one I glanced over but I can help you set reasonable dosages.  And please flush after any nose candy for the sake of your tubes.
